subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Helen Alfredsson shot a five-under-par 67 for the second day in a row to take a one-stroke lead after two rounds of the L.P.G.A. Safeway Classic at Columbia Edgewater Country Club in Portland, Ore. Alfredsson had a 10-under 134 total, one shot ahead of Sophie Gustafson, who shot 68.
